thag5.9:1.2: like an elephant in a stockade.
thag5.9:1.3: Born of the flesh, that net of the senses,
thag5.9:1.4: I won’t urge you to do bad.
thag5.9:2.2: like an elephant who can’t find an open gate.
thag5.9:2.3: Demon-mind, you won’t wander again and again,
thag5.9:3.1: Just as a strong trainer with a hook
thag5.9:3.2: takes a wild, newly captured elephant
thag5.9:3.3: and wins it over against its will,
thag5.9:4.1: Just as a fine charioteer, skilled in the taming
thag5.9:4.2: of fine horses, tames a thoroughbred,
thag5.9:4.4: firmly established in the five powers.
thag5.9:5.3: kept in check by harnessed energy,
thag5.9:5.4: mind, you won’t go far from here.
